title: How to Test if Fabric Is Linen

steps.headline: Moisten the end of a finger with water.
Place this finger onto the fabric and press.
Check the other side straight away.
steps.description: If the moisture comes through the fabric immediately, it's linen. If the moisture is slower to come through, it'll be another fabric.

text: Moisten the end of a finger with water.  Place this finger onto the fabric and press.  Check the other side straight away. If the moisture comes through the fabric immediately, it's linen. If the moisture is slower to come through, it'll be another fabric.
sentences: Moisten the end of a finger with water.

If the moisture comes through the fabric immediately, it's linen.
If the moisture is slower to come through, it'll be another fabric.
